flawed_nl_solution:
The hotel has in total 10 floors * 10 rooms/floor = <<10*10=1000>>1000 rooms.
One floor is unavailable, so Hans could be checked into 1000 rooms - 10 rooms = <<1000-10=990>>990 available rooms.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
